title: Spacious 3 Bedroom floorplans! Come see our great community!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Linden Ridge!', '5400 Memorial Dr Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Rental Size:', '3 BR - 2 BA - 1400 - 1600 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1518 - $2021 |', 'Lease Length:', 'Variable', 'show contact info', 'Linden Ridge is proudly managed by Peak Living.', 'At Peak Living, our mission is to lead the property management industry by creating communities where our residents love to live, and our employees love to work!', 'Our community features:', '➢ 24 Hour Availability', '➢ Business Center/Clubhouse', '➢ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ On-Site Maintenance/Management', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Playground', '➢ Resident Referral Program', '➢ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '➢ City of Decatur "Award-Winning" Dining Just Minutes Away', '➢ Complimentary Wi-Fi At The Business Center, Pool and Sundeck', '➢ Convenient to DeKalb Medical and Emory Hospitals/Medical Centers', '➢ Easy Access to I-285 (Atlanta Perimeter), I-20 & I-85', '➢', 'Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '➢ Monthly Pest Control', '➢ Northlake Mall and North DeKalb Mall Shopping', '➢', 'On Marta Bus Line.', 'Kensington and Indian Creek Rail Stations Nearby', '➢ Stone Mountain Park', 'Close', 'By', '➢ Total Electric - Gardens and Townhomes', 'Our unit features:', '➢ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '➢ Carpeted Floor', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Eat-In Family Kitchens/Pantry', '➢ Range', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Vinyl Flooring', '➢ Formal Dining Room', '➢ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Individual Laundry Rooms with Washer/Dryer Connections', '➢ Linen Closets', '➢ Mini Blinds', '➢ Spacious Storage with Walk-In Closets', '➢ Sunrooms and Private Patios in Select Apartments', '➢ Trash Compactor', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '8A57BB41930342B']
